alert.note: Alert for Jack; Palo Pinto; Parker; Wise; Young (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 04 at 7:37PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Young, northwestern Wise, Jack, northwestern Parker and northern Palo Pinto Counties through 830 PM CDT... At 737 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of Windthorst to near Bryson to near Possum Kingdom Lake. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mineral Wells, Jacksboro, Graford, Bryson, Palo Pinto, Cool, Newport, Lake Mineral Wells, Possum Kingdom State Park, Possum Kingdom Lake, Lake Bridgeport, Fort Richardson State Park, Runaway Bay, Perrin, Salesville, Cundiff, Lost Creek Reservoir, Crafton, Gibtown, and Joplin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for north central Texas. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch also remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for north central Texas.

area.areaDesc: Jack; Palo Pinto; Parker; Wise; Young
